Translations.Text: ane mem tamane pasanda kari lidha, have je vahi karavamam ave tene dhyanathi sambhalo
ni:Sanka hum ja allaha chum, mara sivaya bandagine layaka bijo ko'i nathi. Basa! Tum mari ja bandagi kara ane mari yada mate namajha padhato rahe
ni:Sanka kayamata avavani che, jeni jana hum karava icchato nathi, jethi dareka vyaktine te badalo apavamam ave, je prayatna tene karyo hoya
basa! Have a vise cokkasa jana thaya pachi tamane ko'i evo vyakti roki na le je ana para imana na dharavato hoya ane potani maneccha'oni pachala lagelo hoya. Nahito tame nasta tha'i jaso
he musa! Tara jamana hathamam sum che
javaba apyo ke a mari lakadi che. Jena para hum teko la'u chum ane jenathi hum mari bakari'o mate pandada todum chum ane bija ghana phayada che
kahyum he musa! Ane hatha manthi nice nankhi de
nankhatani sathe ja te sampa bani dodava lagi
kahyum ke nidara tha'i ane pakadi lo, ame tene te ja mula sthitimam pharivara lavi da'isum
ane taro hatha potani bagalamam nakha to te sapheda prakasita tha'ine nikalase. Parantu ko'i khami vagara a bijo camatkara che
a etala mate ke ame tamane amari moti moti nisani'o batavava icchi'e chi'e
have tame phira'auna pase ja'o, tene ghano vidroha phelavi rakhyo che
musa a.Sa.E kahyum he mara palanahara! Marum hrdaya mara mate kholi nankha
ane mara karyane mara mate sarala banavi de
ane mari jabanani gantha kholi nankha
jethi loko mari vata sari rite samaji sake
ane maro nayaba mara kabila manthi kari de
etale ke mara bha'i harunane
Tum tenathi mari kamara majabuta kari de
ane tene maro bhagidara banava
jethi ame banne vadhumam vadhu tara namanum smarana kari'e
ane vadharemam vadhare tane yada kari'e
ni:Sanka tum amane khuba sari rite jonara che
allaha ta'ala'e kahyum, musa tari badhi ja mangani puri karavamam avi
ame to tamara para ekavara ana karata moto upakara karyo hato
